exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce step_failure to an evaluable reference.

original: unfold step_failure. intros. inversion H as [| | Hnet]; clear H. destruct t as [e out]. subst. elim Hnet; clear Hnet; intro Hnet; [ | left; auto ]. destruct (pt_map_name_inverse _ _ H) as [n [Heq Hf]]. subst. inversion H1 as [| | | | Hnet Hout Hs]; clear H1. right. replace Hs with (eq_sym s). split. generalize Hnet; intro Hnet'.
